basics.name: Shantanu Mishra
basics.label: Open-source Developer | Electronics Enthusiast | Math Maniac
basics.summary: Baa Baa Black Sheep Have you any wool. Yes Yes sir. But no bags for you. Well that was mean, I will not feed you. Doesn't matter Baa Baa. Random stuff.

work.summary: Worked on the project VisMa - a visual math solver
highlights: Refactored the whole code base of VisMa to follow object oriented style.
Implemented solvers and calculus modules in VisMa.

work.summary: Had the great opportunity to learn while working on the electronic control systems of the tanks which are used in GSLV- Geosynchronous Satellite Launch Vehicle Mk II. Made a project report on the potential of harnessing solar enerfy at HAL. The report expands on the various solar technologies available and how to integrate and optimize them to power machinery and facilities in HAL.
highlights: Collaborated with the team working on the electronic systems of L-40 strap-on boosters of GSLV
Completed the project on The Potential of Harnessing Solar Energy in HAL

volunteer.summary: Ground up some sort of grasshopper mash for fishing.

education.institution: Birla Institute of Science and Technology - Pilani

publications.name: Radio Julius
publications.summary: Capitalize on low hanging fruit to identify a ballpark value added activity to beta test.

references.name: Nannette Nananacci
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Dugan Nash, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
